name: Panic !!!
description:
INSTRUCTIONS,
READ BEFORE START

PANIC !!!

A failure of your device forces you to perform an emergency procedure.

You must keep all systems operational until repairs are completed.

The procedure takes 3 minutes.

If the system integrity reaches 0%, you will be destroyed.

The computer will tell you which systems must be set to which values.

It remains only 5 secondes so be quick or memorize it !

System Malfunction name will appear in brighter Red.

Made with construct 3 for Reilly JAM 5 "3 events Only"


Music by FL8 Itch - Twitch
C3P Source Code available for download.
